title: Textile, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Square fragment in red on white of a repeating vignette depicting a Chinese gentleman seated in an open litter as he receives the respectful bow of another man. The litter has a canopy suspended from a pole. One of the men carrying the litter stands behind it. Underneath the scene are the words, "Respeto Chinesco." Leafy foliage surrounds the vignettes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Gift of Alice Baldwin Beer. 1952-1-2.
